Author: simplyskyla
Text: I suppose I know deep down you’re right. I’ll try and up my calorie intake by a couple hundred or so tomorrow. I appreciate it :) Man, midterms are hard!

Author: eardingu
Text: There's no secret, your body needs the energy and sadly it comes from food. Honestly when I have to study for exams I up my calories and even eat at maintenance sometimes so I can focus properly. I go back to restricting afterwards but there's no getting around it
